# Changelog

All Notable changes to `laravel-menus` will be documented in this file.

## Next

## 1.0.0 - 2017-09-01

### Added

- Support laravel 5.5
- Dropping php 5.6 support

## 0.5.0 - 2017-09-01

### Added

- Added a Zurb Foundation menu presenter
- Added a AdminLTE menu presenter
- More tests
- Changelog file
